trans-unit.source: Contains the configuration section for the SMSvcHost.exe tool.
trans-unit.target: 包含 SMSvcHost.exe 工具的組態區段。

trans-unit.source: This class encapsulates the various configuration elements for the SMSvcHost.exe tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會封裝 SMSvcHost.exe 工具的各種組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it represents the configuration elements that can be configured in the SMSvcHost.exe.config file.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，它代表可於 SMSvcHost.exe.config 檔案中設定的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.ServiceModelActivationSectionGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.ServiceModelActivationSectionGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.DiagnosticSection"></xref> instance that contains the diagnostics configuration section.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.DiagnosticSection"> </xref>包含診斷組態區段的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.ServiceModel.Activation" name="System.ServiceModel.Activation" href=""></xref> configuration section group from the specified configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_System.ServiceModel.Activation" name="System.ServiceModel.Activation" href=""></xref>從指定的組態檔的組態區段群組。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to extract the activation configuration settings from a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法從組態檔中擷取啟用組態設定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> that represents a configuration file.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.ServiceModelActivationSectionGroup"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.ServiceModel.Activation" name="System.ServiceModel.Activation" href=""></xref> settings in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.ServiceModelActivationSectionGroup"> </xref>表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_System.ServiceModel.Activation" name="System.ServiceModel.Activation" href=""></xref>組態檔中的設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configuration settings for the NetPipeActivator sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 取得 NetPipeActivator 共用服務的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.NetPipeSection"></xref> that contains configuration settings for the NetPipeActivator sharing service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.NetPipeSection"> </xref> ，其中包含 NetPipeActivator 共用服務的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configuration settings for the NetTcpPortSharing sharing service.
trans-unit.target: 取得 NetTcpPortSharing 共用服務的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.NetTcpSection"></xref> that contains configuration settings for the NetTcpPortSharing sharing service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.Configuration.NetTcpSection"> </xref> ，其中包含 NetTcpPortSharing 共用服務的組態設定。
